			                                                                                                                        German Authorities Investigate UBS Over Tax Evasion Claims – Report         
		                     
			                    
								                                          
				
				      
			                  
								                                                                                                  
      
		      

	      
			                     
		          Other articles                                   go to homepage                
		                  
			       
    
                  
							     
								    
                                                                                                 AngloGold Profit Sinks, Says Reviewing Projects                Comments Off              
     
																   AngloGold Ashanti Ltd. (AU), Africa’s largest producer of the precious metal, Thursday reported a sharp drop in profit during the third quarter due increased costs and said that it’s now reviewing some of its projects.    
							      
						     
					     
                                 
    
                  
							     
								    
                                                                                                              Monitor Company files for Chapter 11; Deloitte to buy assets                Comments Off              
     
																   Consulting and advisory firm Monitor Company Group and its affiliates filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection, court documents showed, and said it has agreed to sell its assets to global consultancy firm Deloitte .    
							      
						     
					     
                                 
    
                  
							     
								    
                                                                                                       Sandy might send more than 250,000 cars to scrap heap                Comments Off              
     
																   Superstorm Sandy may consign as many as a quarter of a million new and used cars and trucks to the scrap heap, a loss that could eventually lead to a spike in new auto sales, automakers and dealers said.    
							      
						     
					     
                                 
    
                  
							     
								    
                                                                                                     France, Belgium Set €5.5 Billion Dexia Capital Boost                Comments Off              
     
																   France and Belgium agreed Thursday to inject &amp;euro;5.5 billion of fresh capital into bailed out lender Dexia S.A.    
							      
						     
					     
                                 
    
                  
							     
								    
                                                                                                                         BoCom Chairman: Chinese Banks Will See Stable Earnings Growth This Year                Comments Off              
     
																   Chinese banks will see stable earnings growth this year, but still face credit risks stemming from the slowdown in the economy and an increase in non-performing loans in Zhejiang province, Bank of Communications (3328.HK) Chairman Hu Huaibang said Thur…
